item.description:
Hello Masterminds!

I'm looking forward to our meeting tomorrow.

Please make note of our new location:

As of Monday, March 1st Our new location will be 10 Elm Street Danvers in the Atrium Building.
This new location allows us more flexibility and will be much easier for people to get to us.
We will be right next to all of all the major highways.(128, I-95 & Rt1).

See you all then!

Stay excited!
~ Lauren
item.how_to_find_us: Downstairs at Your Best Life Resource Center

group.name: Think and Grow Rich MasterMind Study Group
